name: linker-connector
description: Linux system data collector and forward to target destination
preInstallNotes: We recommend at least 0.1 CPUs and 32MB of RAM for each LinkerConnector instance.
postInstallNotes: Linker-Connector LinkerDC/OS Service has been successfully installed!
postUninstallNotes: Linker-Connector LinkerDC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
